basehealth.name: One Soul
basehealth.description: Your max HP is reduced by 90%.

noshields.name: Intangible
noshields.description: You can not wear armor or elytra or use shields or potions.

flammable.name: Flammable
flammable.description: You are flammable and fire will not be put out on its own.

other_status.name: Status vulnerability
other_status.description: Status effects deal double damage to your barrier.

risk_gain_4.name: Increasing Danger
risk_gain_4.description: You build up risk while fighting players or vanilla boss mobs.

element.command: tellraw @a {"text":"","color":"red","extra":[{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" suffered the ire of higher beings"}]}
tellraw @a {"text":"","color":"red","extra":[{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" forgot to hold their sword"}]}
tellraw @a {"text":"","color":"red","extra":[{"selector":"@s"},{"text":" should not have done that"}]}
